description: A plugin for self-planning, creating, and managing tasks and subtasks.
explanation: This plugin allows an agent to break down a large goal into a series of smaller, manageable steps and track their status.
inputGuidance: Inputs for this plugin must include 'goal'.

inputDefinitions.name: goal
inputDefinitions.description: The goal or description for the task to be created or managed

inputDefinitions.name: command
inputDefinitions.description: The command to execute: create_task, create_subtask, update_task_status, get_task_list

inputDefinitions.name: parent_task_id
inputDefinitions.description: The ID of the parent task when creating subtasks

inputDefinitions.name: task_id
inputDefinitions.description: The ID of the task to update when changing status

inputDefinitions.name: status
inputDefinitions.description: The new status for the task: pending, in_progress, completed, failed

outputDefinitions.name: task_created
outputDefinitions.description: Result of task creation with task_id

outputDefinitions.name: subtask_created
outputDefinitions.description: Result of subtask creation with subtask_id

outputDefinitions.name: task_list
outputDefinitions.description: Complete list of tasks and subtasks
